abstract: Courses are announced for 2022, 2023 and 2024 United States Open golf tournaments.
lead_paragraph: The United States Golf Association announced three sites for the United States Open, which will alternate between the East Coast and California for at least seven years.

headline.main: Three Sites for U.S. Open Are Announced
headline.print_headline: 3 Sites for U.S. Open Are Announced

snippet: The United States Golf Association announced three sites for the United States Open, which will alternate between the East Coast and California for at least seven years.
